full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Project Title
Inspection System Contract

### Reference and Solicitation Number
WS3950658828

### Tender Status
Expired (May 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST)

### Procurement Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Valcartier is seeking a contractor to provide a comprehensive Main Inspection System (Scanner & Software) and a Layer Removal System.

## Contract Requirements
The contractor must deliver, train, provide maintenance and upgrade services, and technical support for the inspection system. The agreement is to be established in Québec, Canada.

## Solicitation Details
- **Type of Solicitation**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA); Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Contracting Entity Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User**: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)

## Bidder Information
For more detailed information and to download the solicitation documents, please visit: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16161857](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16161857)

## Contact Information
Sonia Langis
 sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

_The information contained in this notice is for general purposes only. Many project parameters are scheduled contracts and projects. Actual bid opening is competitive. E-Tender system hosts these. Supplier bidders must ensure they’re logged and ready._
